Monopoly.Tiles

Class RailroadTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monopoly.Tiles.Tile
      • Monopoly.Tiles.OwnableTile
        • Monopoly.Tiles.RailroadTile

  • public class RailroadTile
extends OwnableTile
    The RailRoad class is an extension of Tile, with a unique algorithm to get rent based on ownership of other railroads
